definition: cooperative/workers' or agricultural producers' cooperative etc
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

pinyin: nong2 ye4 sheng1 chan3 he2 zuo4 she4

sentences.english: Like the SDGs themselves, cooperatives are people-centred.
sentences.chinese: 合作社与可持续发展目标一样，也是以人为本。

sentences.english: She joined a nearby food  cooperative to slash her bill.
sentences.chinese: 她加入了附近的一个食品合作社，以便减少食品开销。

sentences.english: Banerjee says Organic Ekta and other tea cooperatives are a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 有机Ekta”合作社和其它的合作社是不错的事物。

sentences.english: Banerjee says Organic Ekta and other tea cooperatives are a good thing.
sentences.chinese: 有机Ekta”合作社和其它的合作社是不错的事物。

sentences.english: Some cooperatives, for example, raise money for research into important crops.
sentences.chinese: 例如，一些合作社筹集资金研究重要农作物。

sentences.english: Farmers can set up coops to deal with the supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 农民可以成立合作社来与超市打交道。

sentences.english: Or a group of coops may hire a financial intermediary.
sentences.chinese: 合作社组织还可选择与金融中介协作。

sentences.english: The cooperative model enables young people to create and manage sustainable enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 合作社模式能使青年人创造并管理可持续的企业。
儿童营养合作社，亚松森，巴拉圭。

sentences.english: Farmers can set up co-ops to deal with the supermarkets.
sentences.chinese: 农民可以成立合作社来与超市打交道。

sentences.english: They formed an advanced cooperative which they named"Construction Cooperative".
sentences.chinese: 他们成立了一个高级社，命名为建设合作社。

sentences.english: Rural mutual financial cooperative(RMFC) is a typical case of those innovations.
sentences.chinese: 农户资金互助合作社，就是这种创新的典型案例。

sentences.english: She has joined a new tea cooperative called Organic Ekta.
sentences.chinese: 她加入了一个叫作“有机Ekta”的茶叶合作社。

sentences.english: Similarly, the relationship between the co-operative and the peasants should be well handled.
sentences.chinese: 合作社同农民的关系也要处理好。

sentences.english: Credit co- operatives have just started functioning.
sentences.chinese: 信用合作社的活动刚才开始。

sentences.english: The two coops work hand in hand.

pinyin: nong2 ye4 sheng1 chan3 he2 zuo4 she4

definition: commune member (PRC, 1958-1985)/member of a society (or other organization)
to rise from poverty and become prosperous (idiom)/poverty alleviation
